 and the scene is set against a plain background.

metadata.title_text: A Scroll Painting Of A Muharram Procession
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a scroll painting depicting the Muharram procession. Unfolding in a horizontal fashion, the figures are depicted in orderly rows.  They don various garb in a plethora of colours, and the scene is set against a plain background.
